sentences.en: ...a book that purports to tell the whole truth.
sentences.cn: …一本声称讲出全部真相的书。

sentences.en: Documents leaked to this newspaper purport to reveal that radioactive waste is being illegally dumped on the site.
sentences.cn: 透露给报纸的文件声称是揭露放射性废料正被非法倾倒到此地一事.

sentences.en: Her letter may purport her forthcoming arrival.
sentences.cn: 她的来信可能意味着她快要到了.

sentences.en: His telegragram may purport his forthcoming arrival.
sentences.cn: 他的电报可能意味着他快要到达了.

sentences.en: Many theories purport to explain growth in terms of a single cause.
sentences.cn: 许多理论都标榜以单一的原因解释生长.

sentences.en: The frame of the thesis. include the purport, the theory, the method and so on.
sentences.cn: 即讨论了本课题的研究意义、研究理论 、 研究方法、研究思路 、 研究方法和创新点.

sentences.en: The purport of her letter is that she can not come.
sentences.cn: 她来信的大意是她不能来.

sentences.en: The purport of her letter was that she could not come.
sentences.cn: 她来信的意思是说她不能来.

sentences.en: The purport of the message seemed to be this: work harder or find another job.
sentences.cn: 此信的要旨似乎是: 要麽更努力工作,要麽另谋高就.

sentences.en: The purport of what he said is that he is right.
sentences.cn: 他说话的涵义是说他是对的.

sentences.en: This is exactly purport that I want this article of the writing.
sentences.cn: 这正是我要写作这篇文章的主旨所在.

sentences.en: We will purport the most professional service.
sentences.cn: 我们将会为您提供最专业的服务.

sentences.en: Welcome to Lijiang Shangrila, Three parelle Rivers to travel purport food, live, travel and so on!
sentences.cn: 欢迎您到丽江、大香格里拉 、 三江并流旅游,可以帮你安排吃 、 住 、 游、娱等服务!

sentences.en: What is the purport of the speech?
What's the purport of her letter?
You need to grasp the purport of each passage you read.
sentences.cn: 你必须抓住所读的每一段的段落大意.

trans.tran_en: the general meaning of what someone says
to claim to be or do something, even if this is not true
